      • handleException

        @ExceptionHandler(value=java.lang.Exception.class)
public ResponseEntity<org.ameba.http.Response> handleException(Exception ex)
        All general exceptions thrown by services are caught here and translated into http conform responses with a status code 500 Internal Server Error.
        Parameters:
        ex - The exception occurred
        Returns:
        A response object wraps the server result

      • handleValidationException

        @ExceptionHandler(value={org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException.class,javax.validation.ValidationException.class})
public ResponseEntity<org.ameba.http.Response> handleValidationException()
        Transforming MethodArgumentNotValidException ValidationException into server error 500 Internal Server Error responses with according validation error message text.
        Returns:
        A response object wraps the server result

      • translate

        protected String translate(String key,
                           Object... objects)
        Get the messageSource.
        Parameters:
        key - The error code to search message text for
        objects - Any arguments that are passed into the message text
        Returns:
        the messageSource.

      • buildResponse

        protected <T extends org.ameba.http.AbstractBase> ResponseEntity<org.ameba.http.Response<T>> buildResponse(HttpStatus code,
                                                                                                           String msg,
                                                                                                           String msgKey,
                                                                                                           T... params)
        Build a response object that signals a not-okay response with a given status code.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Some type extending the AbstractBase entity
        Parameters:
        code - The status code to set as response code
        msg - The error message passed to the caller
        msgKey - The error message key passed to the caller
        params - A set of Serializable objects that are passed to the caller
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity with status code

      • buildResponse

        protected <T extends org.ameba.http.AbstractBase> ResponseEntity<org.ameba.http.Response<T>> buildResponse(HttpStatus code,
                                                                                                           String msg,
                                                                                                           String msgKey,
                                                                                                           MultiValueMap<String,String> headers,
                                                                                                           T... params)
        Build a response object that signals a not-okay response with a given status code and with given http headers.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Some type extending the AbstractBase entity
        Parameters:
        code - The status code to set as response code
        msg - The error message passed to the caller
        msgKey - The error message key passed to the caller
        headers - The map of headers.
        params - A set of Serializable objects that are passed to the caller
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity with status code

        Type Parameters:
        T - Some type extending the AbstractBase entity
        Parameters:
        params - A set of Serializable objects that are passed to the caller
        Returns:
